ng-add.description: The default schematic to use when ng-lcu is added to an Angular project.

application.description: The Schematic used to initialize a new LCU Application.

library.description: The Schematic used to initialize a new LCU Library.

solution.description: Schematic for creating a new LCU Solution.

lcu-core-app.description: Schematics for seeding LCU Core App.

lcu-form.description: Schematics for seeding an LCU form.

lcu-starter-app.description: Schematics for seeding an LCU Starter Application.

lcu-starter-lib.description: Schematics for seeding an LCU Starter Library.

module.description: Schematic to add a Angular module to a specific project.

documentation.description: Schematic to add lcu-documentation library and structure to a application.
